content.text:
# 1891 Newcastle colonial by-election

A by-election was held for the New South Wales Legislative Assembly electorate of Newcastle on 14 April 1891 because of the death of James Fletcher ().
The East Sydney by-election was held on the same day.
Dates
{| class="wikitable"
! Date !! Event
|-
| 19 March 1891
| Death of James Fletcher.
|-
| 31 March 1891
| Writ of election issued by the Speaker of the Legislative Assembly.
|-
| 10 April 1891
| Day of nomination
|-
| 14 April 1891
| Polling day
|-
| 21 April 1881
| Return of writ
|}
Results
}}
James Fletcher () died.
